ConversionOption.name: MS comments to rs
ConversionOption.description: Converts comments created using the commenting function in DOCX to <rs>. This stylesheet MUST come before "UIBK to <anchor>".

ConversionOption.name: UIBK to anchor
ConversionOption.description: Default conversion will convert the anchors in DOCX comments to <uibk:comment>. This stylesheet will convert the <uibk:comment> to <tei:anchor>. When combined with "MS comments", this stylesheet MUST come after "MS comments".

ConversionOption.name: rs to ref
ConversionOption.description: Converts <rs> in TEI to <persName>, <placeName> or <subject>, if the @key starts with 'P:', 'O:' and 'S:'. Please be careful when using this stylesheet, since it might produce undesired outcome. This option MUST NOT be combined with "rs add @type".

ConversionOption.name: rs add @type
ConversionOption.description: Adds @type to <rs> if the @key starts with 'P:', 'O:' and 'S:'. The @type value can be either "person>, "place>, "subject> or "remark>. Please be careful when using this stylesheet, since it might produce undesired outcome. This option MUST NOT be combined with "rs to ref".

ConversionOption.name: New line before p
ConversionOption.description:
Adds a new line before each
and

.

ConversionOption.name: Recognize German dates
ConversionOption.description: Tries to find dates in German (e.g. '17.10.2000', '8. 2. 1876', 'MÃ¤rz 1768' or '1492') and convert them to <date> with @when. Please be careful, this stylesheet might produce undesired outcomes.
